statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_quantity = 50, reorder_point = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET reorder_point = 30, current_quantity = 40 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_quantity = current_quantity - 5, reorder_point = reorder_point + 10 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE inventory_levels SET reorder_point = 50, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 102
UPDATE inventory SET quantity_on_hand = 50, last_updated = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity_on_hand = 1000, last_updated = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@supplier.com' WHERE supplier_id = 5;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Smith' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE shipments SET quantity_sent = 200, shipment_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE warehouse_id = 3 AND item_id = 2;
UPDATE warehouses SET location = 'New York', capacity = 500 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE warehouses SET location='New York', capacity=500 WHERE warehouse_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=29.99, product_name='New Product' WHERE product_id=5;
